name: CarlyleGroup
0:
”Alexa open carlyle group”
”Alexa start carlyle group”
”Alexa launch carlyle group”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: carlyle group
des: The Carlyle Group skill provides conference room assistance and support capabilities through an Alexa device. It allows users to request helpdesk support, create support tickets, and access conference room information.
